Content:: Mario Chella (16 March 1934[1] – 13 July 2022) was an Italian politician. He served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy from 1983 to 1992. Chella died in July 2022, at the age of 88.[2]  This article about an Italian politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
